definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: But right now greens are the last people we need to be talking to.
sentences.chinese: 但现在的事实是，我们最不需要向环保主义者布道。

sentences.english: Environmentalists may embrace genetically modified crops as a carbon-reduction technology.
sentences.chinese: 转基因作物将和碳减排技术一样得到环保主义者接受。

sentences.english: Conservationists claim that businessmen then flocked to the island and began rampantly abusing this quota.
sentences.chinese: 环保主义者说，商人云集巴厘岛，开始滥用此项配额。

sentences.english: On the one hand, it marks a big victory for them.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，它标志着环保主义者取得了重大胜利。

sentences.english: As conservationists like to say, every niche is valuable.
sentences.chinese: 正如环保主义者常说的那样，每一个生态位都很珍贵。

sentences.english: Environmentalists saw last year's endangered-species legislation as weak and only minimally effective.
sentences.chinese: 环保主义者却没有看到那种紧迫感。

definition: an environmental activist/a fighter for environmental protection
veganism, a diet consisting solely of plant products/strict vegetarianism
global warming (PRC usage)/written 全球暖化 in Taiwan
